title: Nassim Nicholas Taleb ' Skin In The Game' Talks At Google

sources.title: Nassim Nicholas Taleb ' Skin In The Game' Talks At Google
sources.description: Nassim Nicholas Taleb ' Skin In The Game' Talks At Google American essayist, scholar and former trader Nassim Nicholas Taleb, whose work focuses on problems of randomness, probability, and uncertainty, discusses his latest book "Skin in the Game". Nassim explores the notion that 'skin in the game' is necessary for fairness, commercial efficiency, and risk management, and key to making sense of the world at large. Get the book here: https://goo.gl/XbpgLR
